general.gigTitle: develop and design a hubspot website

sellerCard.oneLiner: Hubspot Specialist, Hubspot Developer, Wordpress,Hubspot Website, Auto
sellerCard.description:
"HUBSPOT COS Certified | WordPress Expert | Weblow Expert | HubSpot specialist| CMS  Expert"

I am a professional WEB framework and a hybrid App developer with Excellent communication skills. Always provide you with a daily progress report. Expert in giving server and domain consultancy so that my client will have

- Full end-to-end product delivery
- Best communication and availability 
- Top-Notch quality at an affordable and competitive price
- Best UI experience for all the target audiences.

description.content:
Hello! I am a HubSpot Certified Developer and Specialist with 7 years of experience in HubSpot CMS, including admin tasks, theme development, and API integration.


I excel at creating and managing websites on the HubSpot platform. I'm proficient in CSS3, HTML5, blog design, landing pages, newsletters, and case studies. As a certified HubSpot designer and developer, I have a strong portfolio that showcases my work.


Here is what I bring to the table:

  1. I consistently deliver projects one to two days ahead of schedule.
  2. My expertise includes HubSpot's template builder, custom modules, HUBL, CSS, JavaScript/jQuery, and responsive design.
  3. I offer flexible communication and working hours to align with your needs.
  4. I can follow your specifications while providing valuable insights for effective execution.


Here are some examples of my previous HubSpot projects:

  1. https://www.finout.io/
  2. https://www.keonahealth.com/patient-self-scheduling-software (Animation) https://www.myclientshare.com/
  3. https://partners.planswell.com/advisors
  4. https://www.leadquizzes.com/
  5. https://www.saleshub.ca


As a HubSpot Developer, I'm equipped to handle all your CMS needs, optimize your blog, enhance landing pages, and l

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you want multilanguage website ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, Please provide me the languages

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you have branding and logo for new website ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, please share those details as well so that I can set those in theme settings

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you have designs ready for the pages?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please share the designs on fiverr

packageList.title: Develop Basic Website Pages
packageList.description: I will provide the full-fledge 3 pages with mobile responsiveness without Designs

packageList.title: Development of site pages with Blog
packageList.description: 5 Website pages + Blog Listing + Blog Detail + Author Page without Designs

packageList.title: Development of complete website
packageList.description: Development of 10 pages including 1 email template, and 1 LP with 1 blog without Designs

openGraph.title: develop and design a hubspot website

milestones.title: Delivery
milestones.description: I'll send you the final delivery for review and feedback.

steps.title: Website Spec
steps.description: I'll write specifications for your website, including all pages and features.

steps.title: Design concept
steps.description: I'll design a concept for your website, which we can then develop together.

steps.title: Final design
steps.description: I'll deliver the final design of your website for your approval.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: I'll develop a fully operative website for you.

steps.title: Content upload
steps.description: I'll upload your content (ex. text, images, videos, and more) to your website.

steps.title: Final Review
steps.description: I'll deliver the final version of the website for your review.

reviews.comment: Raman helped us with building our new website but he took it to a whole another level with his skills and expertise! He was quick to respond and very helpful with all the meetings we had. I could not think of another person that can do the same job as Raman! We worked with multiple firms that builds website but nothing was like this.
Raman Verma delivered great work and provided professional documentation. Working with him was easy, and he was prompt in his delivery and proactive in his communication.
Great work by Raman. He helped build a great Hubspot CMS theme with flexible modules to suit or design needs.
Raman always delvers quality work and is quick to make any revisions needed! Highly recommend!
